actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."customers" SET
		"company_name" = '{{update_form.fieldState.company_name.isVisible ? update_form.formData.company_name : update_form.sourceData.company_name}}',
		"contact_name" = '{{update_form.fieldState.contact_name.isVisible ? update_form.formData.contact_name : update_form.sourceData.contact_name}}',
    "contact_title" = '{{update_form.fieldState.contact_title.isVisible ? update_form.formData.contact_title : update_form.sourceData.contact_title}}',
		"address" = '{{update_form.fieldState.address.isVisible ? update_form.formData.address : update_form.sourceData.address}}',
		"city" = '{{update_form.fieldState.city.isVisible ? update_form.formData.city : update_form.sourceData.city}}',
		"region" = '{{update_form.fieldState.region.isVisible ? update_form.formData.region : update_form.sourceData.region}}',
		"postal_code" = '{{update_form.fieldState.postal_code.isVisible ? update_form.formData.postal_code : update_form.sourceData.postal_code}}',
		"country" = '{{update_form.fieldState.country.isVisible ? update_form.formData.country : update_form.sourceData.country}}',
		"phone" = '{{update_form.fieldState.phone.isVisible ? update_form.formData.phone : update_form.sourceData.phone}}',
		"fax" = '{{update_form.fieldState.fax.isVisible ? update_form.formData.fax : update_form.sourceData.fax}}'
WHERE "customer_id" = {{data_table.selectedRow.customer_id}};
